Body:
"""Assert that we exit when given an empty DataFrame through a specific filter combination.
    """
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    df = pd.read_csv(data['testcsv.csv'])
    df = df[~df['gpu'] & (df['host'] == 'draco')]
    with pytest.raises(SystemExit) as error:
        plot.filter_dataframe_for_plotting(df=df, host_name=('draco',),
            module_name=(), gpu=True, cpu=False)
    expected_output = """Plotting GPU data only.
ERROR Your filtering led to an empty dataset. Exiting.
"""
    out, err = capsys.readouterr()
    assert out == expected_output
    assert error.type == SystemExit
    assert error.value.code == 1
